HomePage.title: Petra says hello
HomePage.imgTitle: Your Trusted Travel Partner for Unforgettable Journeys
HomePage.infoParagraph: Discover the world like never before with our exceptional travel services. From luxurious hotels to reliable airlines and custom tour packages, we create unforgettable experiences tailored to your dreams.

package1.description: Explore the vibrant culture and stunning landscapes of Morocco.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Marrakech and check-in at the hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Explore the Medina and visit the Koutoubia Mosque.
packagePlan.day3: Day trip to the Atlas Mountains.
packagePlan.day4: Visit the Jardin Majorelle and Yves Saint Laurent Museum.
packagePlan.day5: Discover the Saadian Tombs and Bahia Palace.
packagePlan.day6: Shopping at the Souks and relaxing at a Hammam.

package2.description: Discover the rich history and cuisine of Algeria.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Algiers and city tour.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Casbah and Notre Dame d'Afrique.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the Roman ruins at Tipasa.
packagePlan.day4: Relax at the beaches of Algiers.

package3.description: Experience the wonders of ancient Egypt.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Cairo and check-in at the hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.
packagePlan.day5: Discover Old Cairo and Khan El Khalili Bazaar.

package4.description: Enjoy the modern luxury and heritage of Saudi Arabia.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Riyadh and city tour.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the National Museum and Masmak Fortress.
packagePlan.day3: Explore Diriyah, the UNESCO World Heritage Site.
packagePlan.day4: Relax at the Edge of the World.

package5.description: Explore the futuristic cities of the UAE.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Dubai and check-in at the hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall.
packagePlan.day3: Relax at Jumeirah Beach and visit Palm Jumeirah.

package6.description: Experience the culture and beauty of Qatar.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Doha and check-in at The St. Regis Doha.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Museum of Islamic Art and Souq Waqif.
packagePlan.day3: Explore Katara Cultural Village and The Pearl.
packagePlan.day4: Relax at the beaches and take a desert safari.

package7.description: Discover the natural beauty and heritage of Oman.
package7.hotel: Al Bustan Palace, A Ritz-Carlton Hotel

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Muscat and check-in at Al Bustan Palace.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque and Mutrah Souq.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the Al Jalali and Al Mirani forts.
packagePlan.day4: Day trip to Nizwa and Jebel Akhdar.

package8.description: Experience the rich culture and historical landmarks of Turkey.
package8.hotel: Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at Sultanahmet

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Istanbul and check-in at Four Seasons Hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Visit Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque.
packagePlan.day3: Explore Topkapi Palace and the Grand Bazaar.
packagePlan.day5: Discover Dolmabahçe Palace and Istiklal Avenue.

package9.description: Explore the ancient wonders of Iran.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Tehran and check-in at Espinas Palace Hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Visit Golestan Palace and Tehran Bazaar.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the National Museum and Milad Tower.

package10.description: Discover the stunning beaches and culture of Indonesia.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Bali and check-in at The Mulia.
packagePlan.day3: Visit Uluwatu Temple and enjoy a traditional Kecak dance.
packagePlan.day4: Explore Ubud and the Tegallalang Rice Terraces.
packagePlan.day5: Discover Mount Batur and hot springs.

package11.description: Experience the modern and cultural highlights of Malaysia.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Kuala Lumpur and check-in at Mandarin Oriental.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Petronas Twin Towers and KLCC Park.
packagePlan.day5: Discover Bukit Bintang and Jalan Alor food street.

package12.description: Experience a spiritual journey with an Umrah package.
package12.hotel: Makkah Clock Royal Tower, A Fairmont Hotel

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Jeddah and transfer to Makkah. Check-in at Makkah Clock Royal Tower.
packagePlan.day2: Perform Umrah rituals at Masjid al-Haram.
packagePlan.day3: Visit the Cave of Hira and Jabal al-Nour.
packagePlan.day4: Explore Islamic historical sites in Makkah.
packagePlan.day5: Relax and perform additional prayers at Masjid al-Haram.
packagePlan.day6: Day trip to Ta'if for sightseeing.

package13.description: Join the sacred pilgrimage of Hajj.
package13.hotel: Madinah Oberoi Hotel and Makkah Clock Royal Tower

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Jeddah and transfer to Makkah. Check-in at Makkah Clock Royal Tower.
packagePlan.day2: Perform Tawaf al-Qudum (arrival Tawaf) at Masjid al-Haram.
packagePlan.day3: Travel to Mina and stay overnight.
packagePlan.day4: Travel to Arafat for Wuquf (standing in Arafat).
packagePlan.day5: Travel to Muzdalifah and collect pebbles for Rami.
packagePlan.day6: Perform Rami al-Jamarat (stoning of the devil) and Tawaf al-Ifadah.
packagePlan.day7: Travel back to Mina and perform additional Rami.
packagePlan.day8: Return to Makkah for final Tawaf and Sa’i.
packagePlan.day9: Travel to Madinah and visit Al-Masjid an-Nabawi.

package14.description: Discover the ancient wonders of Petra and Oman's rich heritage.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Petra and check-in at Petra Moon Hotel.
packagePlan.day2: Explore the ancient city of Petra, including the Treasury and the Siq.
packagePlan.day3: Hike to the Monastery and enjoy panoramic views.
packagePlan.day4: Day trip to Wadi Rum for desert adventures.
packagePlan.day5: Visit Little Petra and experience traditional Bedouin culture.

package15.description: Experience the romance and charm of France, from Paris to Provence.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Paris and check-in at Hotel Le Meurice.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.
packagePlan.day3: Explore Montmartre and the Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
packagePlan.day5: Cruise on the Seine River and visit Notre-Dame Cathedral.
packagePlan.day6: Discover the Champs-Élysées and Arc de Triomphe.

package16.description: Discover the history and beauty of the UK, from London to the countryside.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in London and check-in at The Ritz London.
packagePlan.day2: Visit Buckingham Palace and the Tower of London.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the British Museum and Covent Garden.
packagePlan.day4: Day trip to Stonehenge and Bath.
packagePlan.day5: Discover the London Eye and Tate Modern.
packagePlan.day6: Visit Oxford or Cambridge for a day trip.

package17.description: Experience the vibrant culture and sunny beaches of Spain.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Barcelona and check-in at Hotel Arts Barcelona.
packagePlan.day2: Visit La Sagrada Familia and Park Güell.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the Gothic Quarter and Barceloneta Beach.
packagePlan.day5: Discover Casa Batlló and La Rambla.

package18.description: Enjoy the art, history, and cuisine of Italy, from Rome to Florence.

packagePlan.day1: Arrival in Rome and check-in at Hotel Hassler Roma.
packagePlan.day2: Visit the Colosseum and Roman Forum.
packagePlan.day3: Explore the Vatican City and St. Peter's Basilica.
packagePlan.day4: Day trip to Florence and the Uffizi Gallery.
packagePlan.day5: Discover the Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps.
packagePlan.day6: Visit Pompeii and Naples for a day trip.
packagePlan.day7: Explore Trastevere and enjoy authentic Italian cuisine.

About.title: we are the best
About.p: We are a travel agency dedicated to providing unforgettable travel experiences. We offer a wide range of tours to suit all preferences, from exploring historical and cultural landmarks to adventures in breathtaking natural landscapes. Our experienced team ensures that your journey is comfortable and filled with moments you'll cherish forever. Let us take you on a unique journey to the most beautiful destinations around the world.
